name: Bulgaren-Held; Zigarettenfabrik Menes, Wiesbaden LCCN2004665951 - from Commons

desc.html: English:  Title: Bulgaren-Held; Zigarettenfabrik Menes, Wiesbaden Abstract: Poster shows a German soldier smoking. Poster is an advertisement for cigarettes produced by Menes Cigarette Factory, Wiesbaden, Germany. Physical description: 1 print (poster) : lithograph, color ; 44 x 31 cm. Notes: Forms part of: Rehse-Archiv für Zeitgeschichte und Publizistik.; Ludwig Hohlwein, München.; Title from item.
